name: GeoViz (Unreal Engine)
description: AR app for collaborative architectural design and visualization, using Google Maps API and Google Cloud. Geospatial Creator Challenge - Most productive AR application.

name: Digi Yoga (Unreal Engine)
description: VR yoga app with body tracking, multiplayer yoga sessions, and digital avatars performing in virtual environments.

name: Sky Runner (Unity 3D)
description: 3D FPS mobile platform game inspired from Tron Legacy. Contributed to level design and programming gameplay mechanics.

name: Squares (Unity 3D)
description: 2D multiplayer tile game. Developed gameplay mechanics, multiplayer functionality and assets.

name: TeamGlobe (Flutter)
description: Developed games to help reach Global Sustainability Goals using Flutter.
